dmca.title: To Whom It May Concern:
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .

 

Please note that ThePlanet is unable to provide you customer's
confidential information without a Subpoena.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: Michael Gray [mailto:graywolf@wolf-howl.com] 
Posted At: Monday, July 31, 2006 4:27 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Legal Issue
Subject: RE: Legal Issue


I have to wonder what sort of review process you have you can come to
the conclusion that this page
 
http://seo.empireblogs.com/2006/07/21/adwords-quality-score-why-it-won%e
2%80%99t-roll-back/

is not a flagrant and blatant copy of this page
 
http://www.wolf-howl.com/sem/adwords-quality-score-why-it-wont-roll-back
/
 
is beyond me. I'm not interested in filing a DMCA request in fact I want
you to leave the page up. All I want is the name of the legal name of
the site owner so I can prosecute them for copyright violations. If you
fail to comply within 10 working days you leave me no choice other than
to name your company in the suit I am filling. Thank you for your
attention in this matter.
 
Michael Gray.

        -----Original Message-----
        From: Copyright [mailto:Copyright@theplanet.com] 
        Sent: Monday, July 31, 2006 5:09 PM
        To: graywolf@wolf-howl.com
        Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org
        Subject: FW: Legal Issue
        
        
        To Whom It May Concern:

         

        Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice
does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of
the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

         

        Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of
your claim.

         

        Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .

         

        Legal Response Team

        THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

        From: Michael Gray [mailto:graywolf@wolf-howl.com] 
        Posted At: Monday, July 24, 2006 8:31 PM
        Posted To: Copyright
        Conversation: Legal Issue
        Subject: Legal Issue
        
        
        Dear Sirs,
        Please be aware that the domain empireblogs.com which is
registered through your servers is using copyrighted material from my
website without prior permission
        
        
http://seo.empireblogs.com/2006/07/21/adwords-quality-score-why-it-won%e
2%80%99t-roll-back/
        
        As per my liscenicing agreement which is linked to from that
page I am initiating legal proceedings in the amount of $1500 per
offending page
        
        http://www.wolf-howl.com/information/licensing-information/
        
        I request that you turn over all official contact information
for this domain. Thanks you for your cooperation.
        
        Michael Gray
